coreAttributes.authorTag: A tag discreetly sewn onto the inner seams reads 'CosHouse Jet'.
coreAttributes.name: qipao
coreAttributes.description: Primarily worn by the elusive ryus, these one-piece dress closely hugs onto the wearer's body, accentuating their body line.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the qipao up to [npc.her] shoulders and buttons up the top flap securing it.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] the qipao up to [npc2.namePos] shoulders and buttons up the top flap securing it.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the qipao up to [npc2.namePos] shoulders and buttons up the top flap securing it.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the qipao's top flap and slips it off [npc.her].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] the qipao's top flap and slips it off [npc2.namePos].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] off the qipao's top flap and slips it off [npc2.namePos].

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(button)] up [npc.her] qipao's top flap , covering [npc.her] chest.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(button)] up [npc2.namePos] qipao's top flap, covering [npc2.her] chest.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(button)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's top flap, covering [npc2.her] chest.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc.her] qipao's top flap, fully exposing [npc.her] chest.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's top flap, fully exposing [npc2.her] chest.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unbutton)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's top flap, fully exposing [npc2.her] chest.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] qipao's bottom flap back down, covering [npc.her] lower half.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's bottom flap back down, covering [npc2.her] lower half.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's bottom flap back down, covering [npc2.her] lower half.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] qipao's bottom flap up to just below [npc.her] waist, fully exposing [npc.her] lower half.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's bottom flap up to just below [npc2.her] waist, fully exposing [npc2.her] lower half.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] qipao's bottom flap up to just below [npc2.her] waist, fully exposing [npc2.her] lower half.
